title: Sheriff: 5-year-old shot by brother expected to make full recovery
content:
RANKIN COUNTY, Miss. (WJTV) — The 5-year-old girl who was shot by her brother Thursday night is expected to make a full recovery.
According to Rankin County Sheriff Bryan Bailey, the child was in critical condition last night, but is doing much better.
Authorities said her 9-year-old brother accidentally shot his sister with a .22 caliber firearm. The shooting happened on Perez Cove, which is near the Simpson County line.
After the shooting, the girl was airlifted to the University of Mississippi Medical Center for treatment.
